column4: i've installed ubuntu from a minimal cd with openbox and xorg only, how do i check if i need to install a driver (with the ubuntu driver checker app) or if there's updates (ubuntu update app)?
<sudo apt-get update> for updates, idk about the drivers
if there are updates, <sudo apt-get upgrade>
basically i can do "apt-get update;apt-get upgrade" as root and itd download everything if there's any automaticaly or would the upgrade gui popup like in gnome?
if you <sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade> it'll check the repos you have loaded for new packages and prompt you for a y/n to install them
